Address: 43 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
WHAT A BEAUTIFUL GARDEN
The drought has broken and this garden has benefitted from the rain. A cottage garden, relatively maintenance free. But thatâ??s not all, this home offers a feel of come in, sit and relax. The current owner has enjoyed this home but now itâ??s time for another chapter in her life. This home overlooks the Clifton Springs Golf Course. Enjoy the peace and serenity of overlooking the flowers so caringly planted for enjoyment. The floorplan of this home is functional and a good size. Whether you are looking to downsize or become a first home owner then this will tick boxes. Clifton Springs although established over forty years ago is still quite undiscovered suburb on the Bellarine Peninsula where people move in and never leave. All you require is at your fingertips whether that be schools, medical centres, bowling, fishing, netball, tennis etc. For recreation you can ride a bike or a horse along the Bellarine Rail Trail. You can enjoy food at many restaurants and cafes. The lifestyle you choose is available here.

Description:
Amazing Bay Views With Quality & Style
Brimming with quality features, this scenic 3-bedroom home has been extended and renovated to a very high spec. Superb indoor-outdoor entertaining areas capture serene vistas over Port Phillip Bay. Off street parking for up to 10 vehicles includes excellent garaging for a tradesperson, hobbyist or someone with 'toys'.
Entry is into the spacious open living zone with integrated storage. This zone incorporates a quality kitchen on Italian porcelain floor tiles with Smeg dual fuel 900mm cooker, Smeg convection microwave, F&P double drawer dishwasher and Franke stainless steel sink. The adjoining study, or inclusive homework zone, boasts inspirational views, built-in desks and smart lighting. Seamless connection to the alfresco zone, with free standing wood heater, 6-burner built-in BBQ, commercial range hood, 55 inch TV, surround sound and DVD player, is an enviable highlight.
The bedrooms are serviced by luxurious wet areas; the master with huge fitted walk-in robe and en suite, further bedrooms with built-in robes and a family bathroom boasting shower over bath and superior fittings. Great storage features create functionality in the laundry.
Gas central heating, reverse cycle AC and ceiling fans ensure total comfort. Comprehensive cabling includes digital TV connection to all bedrooms and living, data cabling throughout and a 3-station security surveillance system.
Garaging is better than most with a 4-car garage featuring heavy duty storage shelving and workbench, plus a 4-car carport, and a long driveway with dual kerb access.
This high-end home is set in a quiet bayside pocket close to swimming beaches, the jetty, schools, kinders and a range of shopping and sporting facilities.
Inspect the exacting craftsmanship and quality in this excellent Clifton Springs home.
Insights: 7 Coorumby Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Centrally located family home with panoramic views of the bay!
Realisation Auction
Fantastically located and central to both Clifton Springs and Drysdale townships, this elevated, two story home awaits someone to call it home. Enjoy the convenience of having all town amenities, schools, sporting facilities and local beaches at hand, while privately enjoying your own panoramic paradise on the beautiful Bellarine.
With dual living zones set up for family living, you will admire the sensible layout and valuable use of space on the lower level. The open plan living and dining areas are of ample size and have the benefits of dual sliding doors onto the large covered alfresco patio, perfect for enjoying the outdoors while being protected from the elements. There is access to the split level rear yard from here, at the moment under utilised but with outstanding potential.
The kitchen offers stone benchtops, 900mm Blanco appliances and a super-sized pantry with shelving throughout. A breakfast bench is a welcomed addition to this space and perfect for meals on the run.
Upon landing upstairs, be immediately drawn to the double sliding doors opening out onto your private north facing balcony, where the panoramic bay views will leave you breathless. Scoping across Port Phillip Bay and across to the You Yangs, time will be well spent occupying this part of the home. Also on the upper level are two spacious minor bedrooms with built in robes and air conditioning, along with the home's master bedroom, complete with walk in robe and spacious ensuite. Discover the benefits of this convenient, indoor/outdoor lifestyle today.
- North facing panoramic bay views in a quiet, family friendly location
- Centrally located to everything both Clifton Springs and Drysdale townships offer
- Upstairs balcony overlooking beautiful Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs beyond
- 3 air conditioned BRs conveniently located upstairs, master with ensuite and WIR
- Living and dining opening up onto the large covered alfresco area, perfect for all seasons
- SLUG with handy internal and rear yard access
Insights: 46 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 112 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Value! Value! Value!
Conveniently located in Clifton Springs this 3 bedroom home is within walking distance to the beach, close to schools and public transport. The home offers an open plan living, dining and kitchen. The kitchen is newly updated giving this home a fresh feel. Equipped with stainless steel appliances, gas cook top and electric oven, this kitchen comes with an additional work bench or breakfast bar, and dishwasher. Ideal for the entertainers the kitchen leads to a large decking zone perfect for outdoor entertaining. The home features an air conditioner in the living room as well as fans though out including bedrooms. All bedrooms have built in robes. The home is also fitted with a newly installed ducted heating system throughout, with solar panels on the roof allowing for a saving on electricity costs. Outside this large 607sq meter property there is 2 garden sheds, nicely maintained garden, with fruit tree.

Description:
Bayside living in an established location
This livable property offers a quiet and relaxing bayside lifestyle in an established location. Set on a sweeping corner allotment, this timeless facade boasts a pleasant easterly outlook whilst the backyard has a desirable north-westerly aspect.
On entry the family-sized lounge with pretty bay window is peaceful. Further in, the open plan kitchen is bright with natural light and has good vision over the casual living space, back deck and backyard. The kitchen is a contemporary highlight with Caesarstone benchtops, as-new freestanding electric cooker and concealed appliance bench. An office with split system AC buds off the kitchen and functions well as a dining room.
The 3 bedrooms sit close to the spotless central bathroom with bath, shower and separate toilet. The master bedroom features a spacious walk-in robe. Other bedrooms offer built-in robes.
Ducted gas heating and ceiling fans assist comfort.
The oversized double garage offers great storage space and remote access. A trades person or hobbyist will enjoy the substantial shed (3.5x6.5m approx) with concrete floor, shelves and workbench. The 2.5kW solar array and solar hot water system are thrifty assets.
Gardens are low maintenance and the is backyard secure for children and pets.
Set close to schools, sporting clubs, shopping facilities, the jetty, swimming beaches, bayside walking trail and the rail trail, this home is well positioned for convenience and leisure.
Enjoy an inspection here!
Insights: 1 Leawarra Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
ABSOLUTELY NOTHING TO DO , WELL DESIGNED WITH LOTS OF SPACE AND STYLE.
This delightful home has generous proportions and leafy surrounds to enhance and provide privacy. Wide entrance and hallway, gracious formal lounge room with formal dining. The second open plan area combines casual dining, living and large kitchen, all overlooking the outdoor entertaining space and gardens. Three bedrooms plus study. Master with ensuite and WIR. Central bathroom, separate toilet and well organised laundry. Features include central heating, 2 split systems, dishwasher, pantry, loads of storage, quality furnishings and more. Double garage with access to rear yard. Absolutely nothing to do... a very comfortable and solid home.

Description:
Stunning bay views and 3 large living zones
Bayside living is wonderfully relaxing, especially when the water is in view! This 2-storey home in a central pocket of Clifton Springs boasts stunning views over Port Phillip Bay towards Geelong, with the You Yangs front and centre. Sunsets are spectacular. The nightlights are an enchanting talking point!
The entry level has elevated views over the bay and a lovely bright east-west aspect. The sunken living area is a feature, with the kitchen and dining spaces running the length of the western elevation and framing the view perfectly. A balcony, with spacious undercover sitting area, feeds out from the dining zone and floats above the serene water view. The kitchen features 900mm gas cooktop and gas oven, and flows to a 2nd balcony streetscape views.
The bedrooms and bathrooms wrap the central living hub; the master with split system AC, walk-in robe, en suite and private access to the bayview balcony.
The downstairs floorplan includes 2 large living spaces, convenient kitchenette, family-sized laundry and toilet. The family room has an indoor-outdoor ambiance ideal for children, adjoining an undercover sundeck and the backyard. The games room is proportioned for billiards and comes complete with a bar. The tandem DLUG provides ample storage with internal access into the family room. 5kW solar array and a large water tank.
Walk to schools. Minutes' drive to the golf club and boat ramp. Close to the beaches, wineries and organic produce The Bellarine is renowned for.
This home with large yard has much potential. The views take it to the next level!
- 2-storey, 3BR home in central Clifton Springs
- Stunning Port Phillip Bay views with the You Yangs front and centre
- 3 large living zones, scenic entertaining balcony, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets
- Master with en suite, WIR, split system AC and private balcony access
- Tandem DLUG, 5kW solar and rainwater tank
- Big, private backyard ideal for kids and pets
- Walk to school, minutes to golf, boat ramp and other delights on The Bellarine
Insights: 5 Bampi Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Coastal Family Living
This impressive 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, family home has everything you need and more.
Comprising of neat entry and family living room at front of the home, off the living you have a great size kitchen meals area the kitchen offers wooden bench tops, S/S oven, electric cooktop and lots of cupboard space.
Down the hall you will find 4 bedrooms, functional laundry and family bathroom with full size bath, new vanity and new separate toilet.
The master bedroom offers fantastic BIR with ceiling fan and ensuite has new heat lamps, toilet and vanity.
Out to the side of the home comprises of a large undercover decking and BBQ area where you can sit under all year round and relax.
To the back of the yard you have a lovely grassed area with a smaller deck where you can sit and enjoy the bay views.
The drive way is sure to impress the man of the home with garden shed and an abundance of room to house Boats, caravan, trailer and much more.
This beautiful home is positioned in a quiet street, close to our stunning Bay, schools, shops and much more, it is a must to inspect this property.

Description:
Panoramic Port Phillip Bay Views forever!
This solid brick veneer, bayside cottage is feeling a little fatigued but thankfully the location is not and now an opportunity presents itself, for you to acquire a premium slice of real estate that will change your lifestyle in a way that you will never regret.
Offering uninterrupted, panoramic views across Port Phillip Bay to the You Yangs and beyond, you won’t tire of looking through your north facing living windows and soaking in this ultramarine oasis. Steps away from the waterfront, you will find comfort in the trappings of seaside life and enjoy utilising the walking tracks spanning from east to west across this idealistic peninsula. Award winning wineries are at your doorstep in an arena that is well prided on its fresh produce and organic conduct, allowing you to indulge yourself and make the most of this unparalleled location.
The cottage itself is ready to occupy but would surely benefit from some modern upgrades. A large lounge room upon entrance has north facing windows that frame the views superbly, this is further replicated in the living and dining room to follow. A compact kitchen is functional and flows onto the meals space with direct outdoor access. Two spacious bedrooms are placed to the rear of the floorplan, one hosting a commodious walk in robe. The plot size offers plenty of room for extension should you require more space, or simply add on a grand north facing deck off your living zones and call it a day (STCA).
Insights: 25 Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Extended Family Living
Ideally designed to accommodate the extended family, this Art Deco inspired Blonde Brick home sits high on the hill overlooking the Golf course with bay glimpses. The light filled open plan lounge, dining area with polished hardwood floors flow outside through a set of French doors onto the north facing deck, wrapping around the front of this solid home. Inside you will find an updated central bathroom, a master bedroom with full ensuite, 2nd spacious bedroom with BIRs and the 3rd monster bedroom that connects to its own lounge and bathroom with air conditioning, TV points and separate access, perfect for the extended family member or guests that require space and privacy. Approx. 942 sq meters of land with fruit trees, shedding and veggie patch, this is a piece of Art Deco history on a huge parcel of the Bellarine Peninsula.

These stunning Port Phillip Bay vistas towards Geelong, sublime sunsets and tranquil views across the treed hills of The Bellarine, could be the backdrop to your designer home build.
Set in the centre of The Bellarine, in a region known for it's award winning wineries, stunning bay beaches and delicious organic produce, this location certainly has fantastic lifestyle bonuses. Capitalise on this quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood close to schools, local shops, a golf course and safe bay beaches.
Create a dream home and lifestyle here!

- Quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood

- Dream lifestyle!

Description:
Scenic space for life and business
Privately set amongst manicured gardens with panoramic views over Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs, this handsome home delivers the privilege of space and considerable opportunities. The solid 2-storey home capitalises on the stunning garden and bay views and the 4899sqm (approx) allotment provides plenty of scope for lifestyle or business endeavours.
The home is immaculately presented. The lower level offers; large sunken lounge with gas log fireplace, large BR with sunny bay window and walk-in robe, 2nd bedroom, shower room, separate toilet and laundry.
Upstairs the breathtaking bay views are almost overwhelming! The open plan kitchen/dining/living zone flows to an entertaining balcony, all enlivened by the big northerly vista. A wood-burning fireplace and classy timber kitchen, with new oven and dishwasher, are notable in this social hub. Two more BRs share the upstairs bathroom. Ducted gas heating throughout and evaporative cooling above.
Outdoors, the spa house, undercover alfresco entertaining area, 3-car garage and storeroom complete this lifestyle-rich home.
The shedding and huge open air parking space are hidden within nestling gardens. A 18x12x4m (approx) shed provides a huge storage area for vehicles, tools and equipment. The 4-bay machinery shed (12x9x3m approx) almost doubles the undercover storage space. Both structures offer power and high clearances. The wash bay, with pressure pump and 99,000L of rainwater storage, are also fabulous assets.
Productive vegetable gardens and mixed fruit trees will please organic buyers!
View this bayside retreat without delay!
Insights: 16-18 Hill Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Bayside Living at it's Best!
Are you looking for a low maintenance home without compromising on space or lifestyle? Then this is the perfect opportunity for those looking to downsize or just perfect for the young growing family.
This modern townhouse is not only functional in its layout, but is equipped with the all facilities that you could ever need to entertain and relax with your family. Inside, the home boasts a warm ambience with a mixture light filled and cooler areas, an ideal home for all seasons. The versatile floor plan offers three bedrooms on the ground floor which are serviced by a central bathroom. This kids' retreat is the answer to peace and privacy. The master on the top level is accompanied by a walk through his/her wardrobe and ensuite. Multiple living zones are on offer with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout the home. The well-appointed kitchen located upstairs is perfect for those who love to cook. With its stylish open plan living design and quality stainless steel appliances, ample storage, gas cook top and electric oven. The main living area over looks the outdoor balcony that frames the home which comprises of partial sea views. Located only minutes away are the Bellarine's best wineries and cafes, local amenities and public transport. Purchasers will have the opportunity to secure their future investment in this rapidly appreciating area of the Bellarine. Fantastically located only moments to the beach, this residence offers generous accommodation. Other features include:
Dishwasher, Security Shutters, Solar Panels, Solar secure gate, 560L Stainless steel fridge included, SLUG with rear access roller door through garage.

Description:
Live an executive lifestyle!
Live  an  executive  lifestyle  in  this  sumptuous  4-­?bedroom  family  home  with  superb  westerly  views  over Corio Bay, the You Yangs and Geelong, as well as rural vitas to the east. Set near the golf course, boat ramp and rail trail, the lifestyle offered is a privileged one!
The floor plan delivers rooms with grand proportions. The lavish use of Caesarstone and porcelain denote quality, whilst ducted heating and cooling ensure absolute comfort.
Impressive living zones on the lower level encourage a social, indoor-­?outdoor lifestyle and provide inviting spaces for individual activities. The living hub is wrapped by a large deck with swim spa. This magnificent alfresco zone doubles the footprint for undercover entertaining. The first-­?class kitchen features  quality  European  appliances,  huge  island  bench  and  butler’s  pantry.  For  media  buffs,  the  quiet lounge is ideal, whilst the open plan office, visible from the hub, provides a safe homework zone.
Private living and bedrooms are nestled upstairs. Spectacular bay sunsets fill the family room with golden  light.  The  balcony  further  embraces  the  breathtaking  scene  and  the  kitchenette  adds  convenience. Countryside views steal the show in the vast master suite, complete with dressing room and deluxe en suite with spa. Three further bedrooms share a luxurious family bathroom. Garaging  is  ideal  for  tradesmen  or  ‘toys’  and  includes  an  oversized  attached  DLUG,  an  internal  driveway with court access, high clearance carport and detached DLUG.
A 5kw solar array and 8000L rainwater storage feature in the long list of impressive extras!
View without delay!
Insights: 21 Wintersun Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
